title: Chasesol
notice: ⚠️ To install the app, you'll need to allow installation from unknown sources in your Android device settings.
instructions: With your preferred wallet, follow the signals from this application
greenSignal: When the screen is green, buy Sol
redSignal: When the image is red, sell and switch to a stable coin
transactionsText: It's 10 transactions per year, very easy
donation: Try it out, start small. If this app helped you, consider making a donation.
walletLabel: Address to Donate SOL, USDC, USDT, etc. on Solana network:
